attributes.action: STOP discriminating ravers / clubs  of the underground scene in Manchester
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/whats-on/music-nightlife-news/venus-manchester-club-v-closed-14116998
https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/whats-on/whats-on-news/antwerp-mansion-council-closed-rushulme-14342397
https://crackmagazine.net/2017/10/manchesters-mantra-warehouse-close-relocate/
THIS IS  JUST A FEW REASONS WHY  THERE ARE MORE ILLEGAL RAVES THAT ARE MUCH MORE  DANGERS THEN HAVING A PARTY AT A VENUE WITH SECURITY AND RESPONSIBLE MANAGEMENT .
 Joseph Klein
- Soundmills ltd.
attributes.background: In the last  few years Manchester council  started a war on our unique underground scene .They revoking licenses without giving a chance to the owners to fix the issues or they dont even consider giving a license to them at the first place  neither any TEN licenses because they discriminating ravers

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://petitions.manchester.gov.uk/petitions.ti
